item.title: Hunt for Germany's 'most-wanted pensioners'
item.author: THE SUNDAY TIMES
item.description:
When one of Germany's most wanted terrorists was arrested in her Berlin home last month after more than three decades on the run, she asked to use the bathroom before being taken away by heavily armed police.
Closing the door behind her, Daniela Klette, 65, quickly sent a warning text message to an...
